# cv2-helper

Helper for opencv package (https://github.com/opencv/opencv)

Supported APIs
<pre>
import cv2_helper

cv2_helper.utils.draw_rect(image, point1, point2)
cv2_helper.utils.draw_label(image, text, point, font_color=(255, 255, 255), font_size=28)
cv2_helper.utils.draw_rect_with_label(image, point1, point2, text, font_color=(255, 255, 255), font_size=28)
cv2_helper.utils.draw_point(image, point)
cv2_helper.utils.draw_image(image, image_to_draw, point)
</pre>
